item.description:
Join me for some FREE disc tossing. Never tried Disc golf ? Don't worry, we just go out and have fun ( and will guide you along). Basically you just toss a disc along a wooded course and into a metal chained basket. Easy peasy.

We will meet at Hillside Store, across from Muldoon park, to collect discs, water or snacks. Please wear good shoes, bring water and bug spray.There are free loaner discs at the store ( and some for sale if you end up loving it ).

Figure on a couple of hours out. When we are dun we can have lunch at the store. They have a great sandwich bar and even Ice Cream !

Here is a link for some info... http://www.dgcoursereview.com/course.php?id=4935

I'm at 603-315-0275 if your running late or lost.

Anyone wanting to ride down from the concord/ manchester area, I have one seat available.

Rain will cancel this event ( pray for sun).

Â
item.how_to_find_us: Meet me at Hillside store across from the park.
item.name: wimp disc golf
